verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: announced] [ARG1: he is collaborating with Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping to come up with a rescue plan to save the vulnerable company from collapse in a pair of tweets Sunday] .
President Trump announced he [V: is] collaborating with Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping to come up with a rescue plan to save the vulnerable company from collapse in a pair of tweets Sunday .

President Trump announced [ARG0: he] is [V: collaborating] [ARG1: with Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping] [ARGM-PRP: to come up with a rescue plan to save the vulnerable company from collapse in a pair of tweets Sunday] .

President Trump announced [ARG0: he] is collaborating with Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping to [V: come] up [ARG1: with a rescue plan to save the vulnerable company from collapse] [ARGM-LOC: in a pair of tweets Sunday] .

President Trump announced he is collaborating with Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping to come up with a rescue plan to [V: save] [ARG1: the vulnerable company] [ARG2: from collapse] in a pair of tweets Sunday .
